      • isCenteredMode

        public boolean isCenteredMode()
        Centered mode flag
        Returns:
        true: Image will be centered and not distorted (default), false: Image fills panel and may be distorted

      • setCenteredMode

        public void setCenteredMode(boolean aValue)
        Centered mode flag with repaint of image
        Parameters:
        aValue - true: Image will be centered and not distorted (default), false: Image fills panel and may be distorted

      • setLineDashed

        public void setLineDashed(boolean aFlag)
        True: Line between point 1 and 2 is dashed, false: Line between point 1 and 2 is solid.
        Parameters:
        aFlag - True: Line between point 1 and 2 is dashed, false: Line between point 1 and 2 is solid.

      • setBoxEdgePoints

        public void setBoxEdgePoints(PointInPlane[] aBoxEdgePointArray)
        Box edge point array. The following points will be connected (indices): 0-1, 0-2, 0-3, 1-4, 1-6, 2-4, 2-5, 3-5, 3-6, 4-7, 5-7, 6-7
        Parameters:
        aBoxEdgePointArray - Box edge point array (see convention for connection above)

      • removeBoxEdgePoints

        public void removeBoxEdgePoints()
        Removes box edge points

      • hasBoxEdgePoints

        public boolean hasBoxEdgePoints()
        Returns if box edge points are specified
        Returns:
        True: Box edge points are specified, false: Otherwise
